reviews.review_msg: Plays the favorites game big time, which really dampends your grade if your not one of them, even if your work is stellar. The class was really interesting and helpful for later on in Archaeology. The TA was awesome!

Class was so unorganized and unclear as to what he expected from us. He wasn't there for 3 weeks and the TA didn't know what to do. Never gave us guidelines for the project. I was very disappointed and will never take a class from him again!
